title: Boris and Rishi Sunak backpedal after initially saying they would skip quarantine
content:
1. Boris and Rishi Sunak backpedal after initially saying they would skip quarantine  The Washington Post
  2. Covid-19: PM and chancellor to self-isolate in U-turn  BBC News
  3. BREAKING: Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak will self-isolate as normal  Sky News
  4. Boris Johnson will isolate after public backlash following announcement that he will dodge quarantine rules  Yahoo! Voices
  5. Boris Johnson confirms u-turn and says he will self-isolate until July 26  The Telegraph
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Boris and Rishi Sunak backpedal after initially saying they would skip quarantine  The Washington Post
Covid-19: PM and chancellor to self-isolate in U-turn  BBC News
BREAKING: Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak will self-isolate as normal  Sky News
Boris Johnson will isolate after public backlash following announcement that he will dodge quarantine rules  Yahoo! Voices
Boris Johnson confirms u-turn and says he will self-isolate until July 26  The Telegraph

localize.title: ボリスとリシ・スナクは当初、検疫をスキップすると言っていたが、撤回した。
鲍里斯和里希-苏纳克最初说他们会跳过检疫，后来又反悔了。
鮑里斯和裏希-蘇納克最初說他們會跳過檢疫，後來又反悔了。
